empresa_unica: Each company is unique, so we manage employees‚Äô daily mobility according to their needs.
transforma_movilidad: Transform your company‚Äôs mobility with our smart corporate carpooling platform.
coche_privado: Private cars are the main source of emissions. Reducing their use lowers the carbon footprint as well as congestion around the company.
coche_compartido: Carpooling boosts wellbeing and team cohesion, improves employees‚Äô daily experience and allows tax deduction of mobility-related expenses.
ahorro_infraestructuras: Savings on infrastructure, less demand for parking and greater efficiency in employees‚Äô daily commutes.
ponlo_marcha: Get it up and running in your company
integra_negocio: Integrate SharetoGo into your organization and start transforming corporate mobility from today.
transforma_empleados: Start today and transform your employees‚Äô mobility.
contacto_servicio: Get in touch with our specialized customer service team.
carpooling_sencillo: Implementing corporate carpooling has never been so simple.
registro_usuarios: Users sign up with their email and set their travel preferences.
matching_algoritmo: Our algorithm automatically connects employees with compatible routes and schedules.
trayecto_seguro: They share their trip safely with rating systems and reviews from other users.
footer_siguenos: Follow us and join the community
coche_respuesta: If the company requests a closed service for its employees, the car belongs to one of the company‚Äôs employees. The idea is that different employees organize themselves so there is always someone offering seats in their car and others for whom it fits to book them. If the company decides that employees can share a car with any app user, the car can belong to any of our verified users.
beneficios_pregunta: If I act as a driver, what are the economic benefits?
beneficios_respuesta: The benefits depend on how much you use the platform and how many free seats you offer. We guarantee that half of the expenses are covered on each shared trip.
pasajeros_respuesta: Yes, depending on the distance of the trip, passengers pay a certain amount. We try to keep passengers‚Äô payments as low as possible to be highly competitive with other alternatives.
gastos_pregunta: What are the costs for the company?
gastos_respuesta: The company and SharetoGo will jointly assess the situation and reach the best possible agreement. Requesting a trial can be the first step.
servicios_pregunta: Apart from mobility management, can the company benefit from other services?
servicios_respuesta: Yes. From the website, the company can access an intranet where it finds all its company-wide and per-employee data, closely linked to sustainability and compliance with new regulations.
obligatorio_pregunta: Is it mandatory to go and return with the same person?
obligatorio_respuesta: NO. Driver: you are not required to take the same people on the outward and return trip, unless you have published a specific trip covering both routes. Passenger: you are not required to return in the same car you used for the outward journey, unless you booked a specific round trip with the same driver.
espera_pregunta: How long should I wait if the driver or passenger doesn‚Äôt show up?
espera_respuesta: Driver: you must wait for the passengers at the agreed meeting point at least 15 minutes after the scheduled time. Passenger: you must wait for the driver at the agreed meeting point at least 15 minutes after the scheduled time.
anulacion_pregunta: If I cancel, do I get my money back?
anulacion_respuesta: Driver: if the driver cancels the trip and has already received payment, they must refund passengers the full amount. If they arrive more than 20 minutes late, the full amount is also refunded to the passenger. Passenger: if you cancel 24 hours in advance, you receive a full refund; if you cancel less than 24 hours before but more than 30 minutes before the trip, the amount is split: half for the driver and half for the passenger; if you cancel less than 30 minutes before the trip, you receive no refund and the driver receives the full amount.
politicas_pregunta: Where can I find all the details of SharetoGo‚Äôs policies?
politicas_respuesta: You can email us at contactosharetogo@gmail.com or call us through the contact section with any questions. You can also visit our Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions of Use.
hero_titulo: Sharing trips has never been so easy
hero_sub: Act as a driver and/or passenger
hero_texto: Discover how SharetoGo connects your employees in a smart, safe and efficient way to create an outstanding carpooling experience.
dual_texto: Whether you offer your car or are looking for a ride, the process is simple, intuitive and rewarding.
driver_sub: Earn money without changing your routine
driver1_texto: Open the app and easily publish your daily route. Indicate your origin, destination, schedule and available seats.
driver2_texto: Your coworkers will see your trips and can request to join. You‚Äôll receive instant notifications.
driver3_texto: Accept your passengers, automatically share the costs and enjoy a more pleasant and sustainable journey.
pass1_texto: Enter your destination and find compatible trips published by other users.
pass2_texto: Check the trip details, the driver‚Äôs profile and book your seat with a single tap.
pass3_texto: Use the integrated chat to coordinate final details and get ready for a comfortable and safe trip.

paso1_b1: Log in and sign up by entering your basic details.
paso1_b2: Make sure everything is configured in your account section.
paso1_b3: Navigate through the app to publish your free seats or find the best trips available.
paso1c_texto: Registration process takes less than 5 minutes with a step-by-step guide.
paso2_texto: Looking for a trip? Just type your destination in the booking section and find your match.
paso2c_texto: Find the destination that suits you best and book it with a single click.
paso2_b2: Search for your origin or destination.
paso2_b4: Go to the favorite zones section in your account.
paso2_b6: Filter in ‚ÄúBook‚Äù to see the best trips and confirm your seat.
paso3_texto: Employees connect directly through the app, coordinate trip details and confirm their participation.
paso3c_texto: Built-in tools to coordinate every detail of the trip.
qs_hero_texto: We‚Äôre the team behind the corporate carpooling revolution, committed to creating a more sustainable and connected future for companies.
qs_mision_texto:
At SharetoGo, we believe sharing moves us forward. We‚Äôve developed a smart and sustainable solution to drive corporate carpooling in Spain, connecting people with free seats to those who share the same or similar origin and destination.

Our goal is to promote sustainable mobility in companies and specific areas, reducing traffic, costs and CO‚ÇÇ emissions. We also provide precise environmental impact metrics, helping organizations meet their ESG goals and sustainable mobility plans.

SharetoGo stands for innovation, collaboration and a strong commitment to a more efficient, responsible and connected future.
qs_impacto_texto: Thanks to SharetoGo, these are some of the figures that reflect our commitment to sustainable mobility.
qs_equipo_texto: We are a group of people working ambitiously day after day to change mobility habits in society. For us, keeping the team united and connected has always been a key and priority element for turning the initial idea into a solid mobile app project. This is just the starting grid. Together, we‚Äôll make it happen.
od_titulo: Which SDGs do we contribute to?
od_texto: SharetoGo promotes collaborative mobility aligned with the Sustainable Development Goals.
od3_desc: Less pollution and traffic for better air quality.
od9_desc: Smart mobility with technology and shared routes.
od11_desc: Less congestion and emissions; more liveable cities.
od12_desc: Shared vehicle usage and more efficient resources.
rev_sub: Discover why companies and employees choose SharetoGo.

ct_faq1_q: How long does it take to implement SharetoGo?
ct_faq1_a: A typical implementation takes up to 2 weeks, including setup, integration with existing systems and team training.
ct_faq2_q: What level of adoption can I expect?
ct_faq2_a: Our clients typically see 60‚Äì80% adoption in the first 3 months, with satisfaction rates above 95%.
ct_faq3_q: How do you guarantee employee safety?
ct_faq3_a: We include user data verification, a rating system and 24/7 support for emergencies.
ee_hero_sub: Corporate carpooling solutions designed for companies that want to cut costs, improve employee wellbeing and reach their sustainability goals.
ee_sol_sub: Every company is unique. That‚Äôs why we offer flexible solutions that adapt to your specific needs.
ee_sol_mid_text: Enterprise solution for organizations with more than 250 employees seeking to improve the mobility of their teams, strengthen their corporate image and meet the legal challenges of sustainable mobility.
ee_sol_mid_b1: Everything included for medium-sized companies, adjusted to higher volume and/or multiple centers
ee_sol_mid_b2: Prioritized evolutionary maintenance to accelerate improvements and new features
ee_sol_mid_b3: More robust internal communication campaigns and plans

ee_sol_mid_b5: Reinforcement of the sustainable narrative towards key audiences
ee_sol_large_text: Strategic solution for very large organizations (500+), aimed at transforming their corporate mobility, reinforcing their sustainable leadership, and complying with global standards of responsibility and efficiency.

ee_sol_large_b3: Strengthening of corporate reputation with content aligned with climate objectives
ee_sol_large_b4: Greater operational customization, indicators, and reporting according to international scope
ee_sol_large_b5: Solution scaled for large business groups with multiple locations

ee_sol_small_b1: Corporate carpooling platform configured and managed for your team

ee_part_title: Are you part of an industrial park or looking to partner with another company?
ee_part_sub: We connect you through business partnerships
ee_part_p1: In business parks, industrial zones or areas where several companies coexist, SharetoGo enables cooperation agreements between companies to optimize all journeys from those areas.
ee_part_p2: Each company keeps its own control panel if it wishes, with its own sustainability reports. There is also the option to have a single report for the entire area.
ee_ben1_text: Comprehensive dashboard with real-time metrics for savings, environmental impact and adoption.
ee_ben2_text: Identity verification, GPS tracking and corporate security protocols.
ee_ben3_text: Onboarding and gamification program that ensures high employee participation.
ee_ben4_text: Contribute to your company‚Äôs ESG goals with verifiable CO‚ÇÇ reduction metrics.
ee_ben5_text: From contract signature to the first week of usage in less than 14 days.
ee_ben6_text: Dedicated account manager, 24/7 support and continuous updates included.
ee_cases_sub2: We are open to discussions with companies interested in leading this change and promoting sustainable mobility, offering them the opportunity to learn more about our value proposition. Contact us here with no obligation and let's talk.
ee_cases_sub3: Example of how your company could appear on the SharetoGo page:
ee_case1_quote: SharetoGo helped us cut parking costs by 60% and significantly improve employee satisfaction. Implementation was surprisingly fast.
ee_case2_quote: The platform integrated perfectly with our existing systems. Our employees adopted it immediately and the results exceeded expectations.
ee_reality2: After consolidating our user base, we are looking for organizations that want to integrate sustainable mobility. We want to show them how our proposal benefits both their structure and their teams.
ev_hero_sub: Explore and join your favorite zone.
ev_hero_sub2: Drivers publish their trips and, based on their location, are automatically added to a specific zone.
ev_hero_sub3: Passengers can join any zone, explore and filter trips, see active routes and book their trip in just two clicks.
ev_intro_text: <bold>SharetoGo connects people moving in the same direction.<bold> We make daily shared trips easier to and from <bold>universities and industrial areas<bold>, as well as journeys to <bold>airports, fairs or stadiums<bold>, where thousands of people coincide every day.
ev_intro_text2: Less traffic, more connection, and a smarter way to move.
ev_intro_img_alt: Event with crowd and stage lights
ev_poly_title: Industrial zones that are alive, connected and efficient.
ev_poly_tagline: Share your car in your industrial zone
ev_poly_p1: In industrial areas, mobility is a daily challenge. More than <bold>90% of workers commute in a single-occupancy car<bold>, and <bold>75% don‚Äôt use public transport<bold> due to poor connections or a lack of alternatives.
ev_poly_p2: The result: traffic jams, parking difficulties and a huge environmental impact.
ev_poly_stats_intro1: Imagine an industrial zone with <bold>5,000 employees.<bold>
ev_poly_stats_intro2: That means <bold>25,000 weekly commutes<bold> and more than <bold>3,000 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year.<bold>
ev_poly_stats_intro3: The <bold>average vehicle occupancy<bold> is just 1.1 people. But with <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, all that can change.
ev_poly_stats_intro4: Our platform allows both <bold>drivers and passengers<bold> to easily connect and <bold>share cars for their daily commutes<bold>. If only <bold>30% of employees<bold> started doing it:
ev_poly_stats_b1: More than <bold>900 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year would be avoided<bold>
ev_poly_stats_b3: More than <bold>1,000 parking spaces per day would be freed up<bold>
ev_poly_stats_b4: And more than <bold>‚Ç¨600.000 per year<bold> would be saved in transport costs (fuel, tolls and maintenance)
ev_poly_impact_p1: This is equivalent to planting <bold>40,000 trees<bold>, saving <bold>180,000 litres of petrol<bold>, and <bold>reducing energy consumption<bold> comparable to that of <bold>3,000 offices for a year.<bold>
ev_poly_impact_p2: With <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, drivers can <bold>share their trips and earn money<bold> for every occupied seat, while passengers <bold>save money and travel comfortably<bold> with coworkers or people from the same industrial area.
ev_poly_impact_p3: All from a simple, safe app designed for recurring trips.
ev_poly_list4: And a work environment that moves in a smarter, more sustainable way.
ev_poly_cta: <bold>Start sharing your car in your industrial zone with SharetoGo.<bold>
ev_venues_title: Share your car to university with SharetoGo
ev_venues_sub: Connect students to reduce congestion and make it easier to get to class.
ev_uni_desc1: Every day, thousands of students, lecturers and staff travel to campus, many of them early in the morning, relying on <bold>overcrowded and unreliable public transport<bold> and <bold>losing hours of rest<bold> just to get to class or work on time.
ev_uni_desc2: Over 80% of trips to university campuses are made by private car or low-efficiency public transport. With SharetoGo, members of the same university can share a car easily and safely, reducing costs, emissions and travel time.
ev_uni_desc3: The app also lets you connect <bold>not only with people from your own university<bold>, but also with <bold>users from nearby campuses or other close universities<bold>, expanding your trip options. If you prefer to restrict it to your campus only, you can also do that, although <bold>the number of available trips will be slightly reduced.<bold>
ev_uni_impact_title: The impact of carpooling at university
ev_uni_impact_p2: even with moderate participation in carpooling, over 300 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year could be avoided, equivalent to:
ev_uni_impact_example_p1: The <bold>Universitat de Barcelona<bold> has more than <bold>69,000 people<bold> among students, faculty and staff.
ev_uni_impact_example_p2: If just <bold>20% of the university community<bold> ‚Äî around <bold>13,800 people<bold> ‚Äî shared a car to commute each day, more than <bold>400 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year<bold> could be avoided, which is equivalent to:
ev_uni_impact_example_b1: Removing around 2,500 cars from the road every day,
ev_uni_impact_example_b4: Turning off all the lights in more than 1,000 university classrooms for a year.
ev_uni_benefits_p1: With <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, <bold>drivers<bold> can share their trips and <bold>earn money<bold> for each occupied seat, while <bold>passengers<bold> find comfortable, affordable and sustainable ways to get to class or work.
ev_uni_benefits_p2: A community that moves together, improves its environment and gains time for what really matters.
ev_uni_pill: Share your car. Connect campuses. Move with SharetoGo.
ev_uni_text: With SharetoGo, anyone can offer free seats in their car when going to a campus or crowded event. Optimize flows and make the trip easier for everyone.
ev_event_section_title: Organizing an event? Manage attendees‚Äô mobility with SharetoGo.
ev_event_card1: We can integrate your event into our platform so attendees can share cars in a comfortable, safe and sustainable way.
ev_event_card2_text: We will help you reduce traffic, emissions and travel costs associated with your event.
ev_event_card2_extra: You‚Äôll also get access to personalized sustainability and mobility reports, with real data on the positive impact generated.
ev_zones_section_title: Find your perfect zone and keep it handy
ev_zones_p1: <bold>Search zones<bold>: explore all favorite zones in the Account section. Once you‚Äôve selected your zones, go to BOOK to filter by location and choose a trip. Find a trip in seconds.
ev_zones_p2: <bold>Save your zones<bold>: join your favorite zones and check anytime which ones you belong to. If you need to, you can leave a zone and join others in just two clicks. That way your trips are always organized and up to date.
ev_airport_title: Share your car to the airport with SharetoGo
ev_airport_p1: Every day, thousands of workers and travellers go to the airport in single-occupancy cars. If only <bold>30%<bold> of them shared a trip, more than <bold>900 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year<bold> would be avoided ‚Äî the equivalent of <bold>planting 40,000 trees üå≥<bold>. It would be like cancelling more than 1,200 Madrid‚ÄìBarcelona flights.
ev_airport_p2: With <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, you save money, reduce traffic and help the planet. <bold>Fewer cars. Cleaner air.<bold>
ev_stadium_title: Share your car to stadiums and concerts with SharetoGo
ev_stadium_p1: Each sports match or concert brings together <bold>thousands of people<bold>, and more than <bold>85% arrive in single-occupancy cars<bold>. If only <bold>30%<bold> shared a trip, we could <bold>avoid more than 1,200 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year<bold>, equivalent to <bold>turning off all the lights in 2,500 homes for a year üí°<bold>.
ev_stadium_p2: With <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, you split costs, arrive comfortably and help the planet. <bold>Less traffic. More atmosphere.<bold>
ev_fair_title: Share your car to fairs and conferences with SharetoGo
ev_fair_p1: Fairs move ideas, people and opportunities‚Ä¶ but also thousands of cars. With <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, exhibitors and visitors can share trips, cut costs and improve mobility around the venue.
ev_fair_p2: If only <bold>30%<bold> did so, the energy savings would be enough to <bold>light more than 2,000 stands for a whole year.<bold> <bold>Move with your industry, not against the traffic.<bold>
ev_nightlife_title: Share your car to clubs and nightlife areas with SharetoGo
ev_nightlife_p: Every weekend, thousands of people drive to clubs and nightlife areas. More than <bold>80%<bold> go in single-occupancy vehicles, generating traffic, emissions and parking headaches. If only <bold>30%<bold> shared trips, more than <bold>600 tonnes of CO‚ÇÇ per year<bold> could be avoided ‚Äî equivalent to <bold>not burning 250,000 litres of petrol ‚õΩ<bold>. With <bold>SharetoGo<bold>, you arrive comfortably, save money and look after the planet. <bold>Fewer cars. More nights to enjoy.<bold>
